name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior .NET Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience, specializing in **.NET**, **C#**, **SQL Server**, and **.NET Core**. Proficient in building and optimizing high-performance applications, leveraging technologies such as Visual Studio and **ETL** processes. My background includes implementing robust architectures and seamless integrations, ensuring compliance with industry standards. I have a solid grasp of software quality through tools like **Sonar** and experience in developing user interfaces with **jQuery**.
In addition to .NET expertise, I possess a strong foundation in JavaScript/TypeScript and Python, having built solutions in healthcare and financial sectors with frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and server-side technologies like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My capabilities extend to cloud services, with hands-on experience in **Azure** and **AWS**. I have led enterprise-grade platform developments incorporating advanced AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation, while also implementing CI/CD automation to enhance deployment efficiency.
